response.original_title: Four Years of Love: The Grenada Revolution
response.overview: In the early morning hours of March 13, 1979 a small but determined group took action to overthrow their brutal authoritarian government.  What followed was a mass uprising that ushered in a new government determined to put the people first.  Featuring interviews from leading scholars Professorâ€™s Anthony Bogues, Brian Meeks and Patsy Lewis and actual participants in the PRG, Former Deputy Prime Minister and Minister Finance: Bernard Coard and Press Secretary to Prime Minister Maurice Bishop: Don Rojas.
response.title: Four Years of Love: The Grenada Revolution
